com.franza.Academic.beans

Class DepartmentBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.franza.Academic.beans.DepartmentBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DepartmentBeanLocal, JavaBean

    public class DepartmentBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements JavaBean, DepartmentBeanLocal

    Instantiable class that implements:

    • the generic CRUD operations whose signature is available in the java bean class,
    • the custom operations whose signature is available in the java bean local.

    The instances belonging to this class are instantiated by injection and are needed to accomplish business operations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DepartmentBean() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<TO> create(TO to)
      Public method that delegates the data access object to generate a new department in the database using an entity bean.
      java.util.List<TO> delete(TO to)
      Public method that delegates the data access object to delete a department present in the database using an entity bean.
      java.util.List<TO> read(TO to)
      Public method that delegates the data access object to read a list of departments in the database using an entity bean as a search key.
      java.util.List<TO> update(TO to)
      Public method that delegates the data access object to update a department already present in the database using an entity bean.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public java.util.List<TO> create(TO to)
                          throws InvalidInputException

        Public method that delegates the data access object to generate a new department in the database using an entity bean.

        Specified by:
        create in interface JavaBean
        Parameters:
        to - : transfer object needed to encapsulate and transfer department data from the application controller to the entity bean.
        Returns:
        the list of the departments for the executed operation of creation: has to contain the inserted department.
        Throws:
        InvalidInputException - Exception thrown when one or more inputs given by the user are not valid. It is generated by the read function of this same class.

      • read

        public java.util.List<TO> read(TO to)
                        throws InvalidInputException

        Public method that delegates the data access object to read a list of departments in the database using an entity bean as a search key.

        Specified by:
        read in interface JavaBean
        Parameters:
        to - : transfer object needed to encapsulate and transfer department data from the application controller to the entity bean.
        Returns:
        the list of the departments for the executed operation of reading: has to contain all the departments that satisfy the search key.
        Throws:
        InvalidInputException - Exception thrown when one or more inputs given by the user are not valid. It is generated by the operation that moves the department data from the transfer object to the entity bean.

      • update

        public java.util.List<TO> update(TO to)
                          throws InvalidInputException

        Public method that delegates the data access object to update a department already present in the database using an entity bean.

        Specified by:
        update in interface JavaBean
        Parameters:
        to - : transfer object needed to encapsulate and transfer department data from the application controller to the entity bean.
        Returns:
        the list of the departments for the executed operation of update: has to contain the updated department.
        Throws:
        InvalidInputException - Exception thrown when one or more inputs given by the user are not valid. It is generated by the read function of this same class.

      • delete

        public java.util.List<TO> delete(TO to)
                          throws InvalidInputException

        Public method that delegates the data access object to delete a department present in the database using an entity bean.

        Specified by:
        delete in interface JavaBean
        Parameters:
        to - : transfer object needed to encapsulate and transfer department data from the application controller to the entity bean.
        Returns:
        the list of the departments for the executed operation of deletion: has to contain no departments.
        Throws:
        InvalidInputException - Exception thrown when one or more inputs given by the user are not valid. It is generated by the read function of this same class.
